title: Hour 1 - Peter King (06-08-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Peter King (06-08-20)
description:
Peter King gives Dan his reaction to the Roger Goodell video. Peter says "NOW WHAT" to the NFL owner since we are yet to hear from them. Peter does not think Colin Kaepernick will be offered a contract to be a starting QB in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Peter King gives Dan his reaction to the Roger Goodell video. Peter says "NOW WHAT" to the NFL owner since we are yet to hear from them. Peter does not think Colin Kaepernick will be offered a contract to be a starting QB in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
